project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a program that fetches current weather information for a specified city using a public API, displaying temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the functionality to fetch weather data from a public API
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement user input functionality to accept the name of the city
Display the output in the terminal including temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Write tests for fetching and parsing weather data
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
